title: Spotify pulls support for in-car head unit integration just a few months after killing in-app ‘Car View’
content:
Music is a core form of entertainment while on the road, but Spotify has been shuffling its car strategy up as of late. Now, just a week after releasing its “Car Thing” hardware to the public, Spotify is pulling support for in-car head units from Pioneer and other brands.

more…

The post Spotify pulls support for in-car head unit integration just a few months after killing in-app ‘Car View’ appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Spotify has officially "depreciated" support for in-car head units from Pioneer and JVC-Kenwood, removing the feature from Android and iOS.
